fields.fieldText: Cooper Parry Advisory Limited Individual Risk Assessment

fields.name: financialrisk
fields.fieldText: FINANCIAL RISK

fields.name: yesno2
fields.fieldText: YES / NO / N/A

fields.name: fin1
fields.fieldText: Is a liability cap to be incorporated?

fields.name: fin2
fields.fieldText: How and when will we be paid?

fields.name: fin2display
fields.fieldText: On presentation of invoice

fields.name: fin3

fields.name: pickfinyes4
fields.fieldText: If yes, summarise the contingent arrangement below:

fields.name: mrlatitle
fields.fieldText: MONEY LAUNDERING RISK ASSESSMENT

fields.name: yesnomlra
fields.fieldText: YES/NO/N/A

fields.name: mlra16
fields.fieldText: Does the client hold assets or undertake activities overseas?

fields.name: mlra17
fields.fieldText: Does the client have links with individuals or businesses in overseas countries with weak money laundering regimes?

fields.name: mrla18
fields.fieldText: Does the client use products, services or entities which provide anonymity?

fields.name: mlra19
fields.fieldText: Does the client use products, services or entities which provide anonymity?

fields.name: mlra20
fields.fieldText: Do we have any concerns over the source of the client’s wealth?

fields.name: mlra5
fields.fieldText: Do we have any concerns over the source of the client’s funds?

fields.name: mlra7
fields.fieldText: Do we anticipate holding monies for the client?

fields.name: hrdisplay
fields.fieldText: A “Yes” answer to ANY of the above means the client must be treated as high risk

fields.name: cppolicy
fields.fieldText: Updated CP policy - ALL clients have to be met either in person or via a Teams meeting so that photo ID and person can be matched and verified:

fields.name: mlra9
fields.fieldText: Confirm client has been met please state which team member met them:

fields.name: mlra10
fields.fieldText: Please name the individuals whom we met:

fields.name: mlra11
fields.fieldText: Other comments:

fields.name: mlra12
fields.fieldText: Is the client a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)?

fields.name: mlra13
fields.fieldText: Is the client a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)?

fields.name: mlrawarning
fields.fieldText:
A “Yes” answer to either of the above means the client must be treated as high risk and Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) procedures as set out in the firm’s Client Acceptance Guidance Notes (available on the intranet) applied. 

Record EDD procedures undertaken below:

fields.name: mlra15
fields.fieldText: Considering the above factors, the risk of money laundering is:

screens.name: Page_4_IDENTITY_VERIFICATION

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_headerTxt1
fields.fieldText: Cooper Parry Advisory Limited Individual Risk Assessment

fields.name: identityverif
fields.fieldText: Identity verification

fields.name: identityverif2
fields.fieldText:
SmartSearch check (“High” risk setting); AND One government issued document with photo e.g., passport or driving licence AND document detailing address e.g., utility bill.

 

Beneficial Owner (if a partnership ensure all Beneficial owners are identified) (for trusts, ensure this includes all Settlors, Trustees, Beneficiaries and Protectors)

fields.fieldText: OTHER RISKS

fields.name: yn
fields.fieldText: YES/NO/N/A

fields.name: or1

fields.name: orpick1yes
fields.fieldText: If yes, please detail below why you are happy to proceed:

fields.name: or2

fields.name: or3

fields.name: or4

fields.name: OBJdisp
fields.fieldText: OBJECTIVITY/CONFLICTS OF INTEREST ETC

fields.name: ynobj
fields.fieldText: YES/NO/N/A

fields.name: obj1
fields.fieldText: Do we already act for any parties involved or have we acted in the past?

fields.name: obj3
fields.fieldText: Are there any other relationships or other issues which may threaten our objectivity or could be perceived to do so?

fields.name: obj4
fields.fieldText: Are we involved in any dispute with any party?

fields.name: obj5
fields.fieldText: Have potential conflicts been identified for any other reason?

fields.name: obj7
fields.fieldText: Considering all the above, have we identified significant personal or professional relationships or conflicts of interest which could threaten our objectivity or be seen to do so?

fields.name: objpickyes7
fields.fieldText: If yes, please summarise below.

fields.name: obj8
fields.fieldText: Can safeguards be implemented which will reduce the threat(s) to an acceptable level?

fields.name: objpickyes8
fields.fieldText: If yes, please describe below.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_beneficiariesHeader
fields.fieldText: ADDITIONAL COMMENTS:

fields.name: Copy_1_of_objwarn1
fields.fieldText:
Conclusion:

I am satisfied that we should accept the appointment / assignment and that the relevant risks have been satisfactorily investigated.

 

I confirm that satisfactory evidence of the client’s identity has been obtained to comply with the money laundering regulations.

 

 

Partner Signature:
